NAME: Nakul Havelia
ABOUT: Interested in A.I. and software development in general.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: Worked as a team to make a mobile app and server that improves users’ shopping experience by solving the ‘traveling salesman’ problem. The project was made in 36 hours for Hackfest'17
Software for electronics department for management of publications made by professors and students.(node.js, MongoDB, HTML/CSS)
Made a mobile app using hybrid frameworks to help people of Mexico city get around using public transport. This app won the $3000 prize in "Ford Mexico Smart Journey"  Hackathon.
Overhauled the complete workflow of the organization by transitioning to paperless practice with a mobile app, saving 80,000 INR a year.

Made hardware on Arduino platform to convert a bicycle into a smart one. The user can select their destination on a mobile app and get directions on a circular led array attached to their bicycle. Made within 36 hours for Hackfest'16. (Arduino, Java, Android)
